section.title: EMFT Newsgroup
section.p: Support for Teneo is provided through the EMFT newsgroup: news://news.eclipse.org/eclipse.technology.emft.

section.title: How we can help you
section.p: We will do our best to answer your questions as promptly as possible. We can help you in the best way if you include the following information:

ul.li: The log file (see here on where to find it)
The version of Teneo Store, Eclipse, EMF, jdk, and database
